titleStmt.title: A Declaration of His Highnesse the Duke of Yorke his going away from St. Jamses. [sic] And concerning the Right Honourable the Earle of Northumberland, from whom he went. April 22. 1648. Imprimatur Gil. Mabbot.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head tavern,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
